title: Vector
description: Maxwell Vector is the most dangerous CEO in the world. His family has been murdered by MS-13 gangsters. He has unlimited resources, an army of assassins at his disposal and a deadly mind. Will revenge be enough or will he bring about the destruction of the American Empire?Detective T.J. Washingtonâ€™s investigation of a string of gruesome murders by a shadowy White Supremacist terror group places him in the center of a political conspiracy and a shadow war. Can he stop the plans of a dangerous sociopath?
author: Samuel Whittemore
